Data Structures

class  Modification

Detailed Description

A Provider is used to store DataItems in a tabular manner. Reading data is done by GetDataItem. Writing is done row by row. A row has to be locked first, data is modified by calls of SetDataItem, the changes have to be committed (either by Commit, AppendRow, DeleteRow, or InsertRow), and finally the procedure is closed by Unlock.
